text: The 1917 South American Championship was the second South American Championship and it took place in Uruguay. Uruguay won the tournament. == Teams == At the time, CONMEBOL only had four members: * * * * == Results == Rkn Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 1 3 3 0 0 9 0 +9 9 2 3 2 0 1 5 3 +2 6 3 3 1 0 2 7 8 –1 3 4 3 0 0 3 0 10 –10 0 30 September 1917 align=right 3 October 1917 align=right 6 October 1917 align=right 7 October 1917 align=right 12 October 1917 align=right 14 October 1917 align=right == Statistics == === Top scorers === 4 goals * Ángel Romano 3 goals * Carlos Scarone 2 goals * Alberto Ohaco * Haroldo * Neco * Héctor Scarone 1 goal * Antonio Blanco * Pedro Calomino * Amílcar * Caetano * Silvio Lagreca Own goals * Luis García (for Argentina) == Other websites == * South American Championship 1917 at RSSSF Category:Copa América tournaments Category:1917 in association football Category:1910s in South America Category:20th century in Uruguay
title: 1917 South American Championship
